section.name: How to update Apache OpenMeetings incubator website
section.p:
Required software:
Sun JDK6
Apache ANT (1.8 or later)

OpenMeetings website ( http://incubator.apache.org/openmeetings/ ) is a copy from the SVN repository.
The file in the SVN to be synced are at:
http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/openmeetings/trunk/singlewebapp/docs/

To update the website you checkout trunk:
https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/openmeetings/trunk/singlewebapp/
edit the files in the folder xdocs
then you run the command:
ant anakia
control the output locally in the folder docs
And then checkin into the SVN both the edited xml and generated html files.
Changes to the website should be online immediately.
